name: Comstar Technologies
description:
Founded in 1989, Comstar Technologies is a full-service technology communications company.  Our specialties include Premise-based Phone Systems (Avaya and ShoreTel), IT Managed/Cloud Services, Technology Infrastructure, Access Control, Video Surveillance, and Audio/Visual Solutions.
Comstar Technologies and its family of employees exist with one singular goal; to exceed customer expectations. Our growth and success is in large part to our attention to this goal. We have guided our technicians, engineers and support staff over the years to use this goal as their primary decision making tool. Simple as it is, the clear goal to create overly satisfied customers has proven to be the cornerstone of our company’s foundation.
Our affiliations with COSTARS and PAISBOA has allowed Comstar Technologies to develop meaningful partnerships with within various industries including Education, Government, Assisted & Independent Living, Healthcare, Hospitality, Property Management, Construction and many more. While our focus started with the Greater Philadelphia Area, our partnerships have expanded nationwide.
